# Democratic Choice (Dominican Republic)

Democratic Choice (, OD) is a center-left political party in the Dominican Republic, founded in 2015 by Minou Tavárez Mirabal and other volunteers.
History
Democratic Choice was announced as a result of Mirabal's split from the Dominican Liberation’s Party in a public letter to the media.
Definitions
Democratic Choice is a political party in the Dominican Republic. The party’s central focus is the construction of a democratic society able to exhibit humanity's highest aspirations and to satisfy the spiritual needs and materials of the Dominican people in a setting of fraternity, freedom, and justice.
